title: Another Texas Grand Jury Declines to Bring Charges Against Deshaun Watson
sub_head: The existence of a second grand jury involving the quarterback, who faces numerous allegations of sexual misconduct, was a surprise days after he was traded to the Cleveland Browns
body:
A grand jury in Brazoria County, Texas on Thursday decided not to bring charges against NFL superstar Deshaun Watson for an accusation of sexual misconduct, the county’s district attorney’s office said.
The existence of this grand jury was a surprise revelation after days earlier he was traded to the Cleveland Browns—and given a big raise—following the news that another grand jury in the state had decided to not charge him.
